name: multiple-internship-offers
description: Mentors discuss handling multiple offers and deadline extensions.

events.content: I have two internship offers with conflicting deadlines. What’s the etiquette for asking an extension?
Reach out to the recruiter before the deadline, explain you’re finalizing decisions, and request a one-week extension.
Template: thank them, mention you’re comparing opportunities, and ask if they can extend to <date>. Most companies will if you’re upfront.
Save the confirmation email in case you need proof of the new date.
